overview: Robert Fuschnig, a muscle-bound self-promoter in his late 30s, is known in his ever-growing internet community as Rob Fusion â€“ a guy the girls fall for, a buddy you can steal horses with. On Facebook, he has a lakeside villa, expensive cars, and beautiful women. However, the reality is different: a sick mother, a job that bores him and no deeper contact with his fellow human beings.
title: Traman
